Text.Text: William Henry Pilkington, Glass safety expert
Also known as "Harry". He made his career optimizing the glass making process and specialized in safety glass. No stronger glass can be found.
Gretl Brown, Mother of the Forests

Mother of Ursula and Greta. Wife of Carsten Green. Loves to work together with Ursula inside the forests and has a passion for wild berries and making jam. The fruits she uses for her jams are from the forests and she uses small colonies of her own bees to help the forest bloom.
Carsten Green, Father of the Arctic Forests

Father of Ursula and Greta. Husband of Gretl Brown. Loves to work together with Greta inside the cold woods of the Arctic. He loves animals and huskies in particular. He has a passion of domesticating wild huskies.
Greta Green, Guardian of the Arctic Forests

Following in her father's footsteps, Greta decided to show her love for the woods in the cold Arctic. Together with her father she spends her days conserving the woods of the Arctic. She fell in love with one of the local hunters. Nukilik Takirak. She brews her own strong drinks to keep warm.
Nukilik Takirak, The strongest hunter

Being the strongest hunter of his tribe, Nukilik was always looking for more in life. When people from other regions came to the Arctic he met Greta Green and fell in love with her. She made his life whole and they shared their love for the forests.
Brandon Heat, The perfectionist charcoal burner

Brandon perfected the art of wood burning for charcoal in the Arctic. He came to the Arctic together with his sister Jenny. Apart from creating a huge amount of charcoal with some extra help he found ways to extract more resources from the conifers of the Arctic and drains resin from them.
Arnakuagsak Takirak, Huntress of the sea
Just like her brother Nukilik, Arnakuagsak got the way of hunting passed through by her parents. She prefers hunting on the shorelines and the sea.
Sir Pryce Pryce-Jones, Warm clothing for everyone
Well known for his entrepreneurship he came up with some good new ideas for insulation in clothing. Perfect to use in sleeping bags, warm parka's and Fur coats.
Jenny Heat, It is not just wood

Just like her brother Brandon, Jenny found a new home on the Arctic. They both specialized in processing wood. Jenny loves processing basic wood into timber to help build other wooden materials. She learned some special tricks from her brother to create some extra charcoal from the leftover wood.
Aissa Okoro, Smasher of stews

Enbesa was really hot for her, she wanted a colder climate and choose to travel to the Arctic. With her seafood stew cooking knowledge she shows the people in the Arctic that Pemmican can also be made with fish. Sometimes she makes some seafood stew as a memory to her times in Enbesa.
Jean-Claude Montagne, The perfect Arctic miner

The oldest of the 3 mining brothers. He perfected mining on the Arctic. Gas mines and deep gold mines do not have any secrets for him anymore. He feels responsible for his two younger brothers after the death of their parents.
Jean-François Montagne, The better Arctic miner

The middle brother of 3 mining brothers. Mining is what he loves, and mostly in the brute conditions of the Arctic. He looks up to his older brother Jean-Claude, his big example. Together with his two brothers he forms the perfect mining trio for the Arctic.
Jean-Marie Montagne, The sad arctic miner
The youngest of 3 mining brothers. He actually hates the cold climate of the Arctic but he had no choice and had to follow his 2 older brothers to the Arctic after the death of their parents.
Amka Etok, Carve to slide

Amka has a family business together with her brother Toklo. They carve and create husky sleds for all Arctic people. She does not really like the sea and that is why she prefers furs instead of seal skin to create the sleds.
Toklo Etok, More then a sled

With his sister Amka, Toklo perfected the creation of husky sleds. But there is more to his knowledge then only sleds. Toklo was once given sketches of Steam Carriages by a traveler. He was so fascinated that he replicates the basic chassis.
Rolf van der Mark, Breeder of Arctic animals

Rolf was always surrounded by animals when he was a child. In contrast with his brother Mark who wanted to produce as much as possible, Rolf wanted to produce as space efficient as possible. They had a business together with their sisters Wendy and Judy but at some point had a huge fight. Rolf could not stand his brother and moved to the Arctic.
Jumoke Okoro, The Enbesian light

With his sister Aissa, Jumoke traveled to the Arctic. They fell in love with the beautiful landscapes and snow. In Enbesa Jumoke produced the best lanterns people could wish for. In the Arctic he started working in the Oil lamp factories and used his expertise to improve the process.
Yuka Saunik, Keep warm and light your spirit
Yuka hates the cold and because of that she wants to keep everyone warm with the perfect clothing and light. Sister of Inuksuk and Umiaktorvik.
Umiaktorvik Saunik, Drinks for everyone
Umiaktorvik knows how to please people. If it is alcohol or coffee, he makes sure all people are kept warm with the perfect drink. Brother of Yuka and Inuksuk.
Inuksuk Saunik, Keep a round belly
Inuksuk loves food and shares his love for food with everyone. He wants to keep the bellies of everyone filled en round in those cold times. Brother of Yuka and Umiaktorvik.
Philipa Sky, Fast, Faster, Fastest
Her biggest dream as a kid was to fly in the clouds. She pursued her dreams and together with her brother Phillip she helped Old Nate learning to navigate airships.
Phillip Sky, Going with the flow of the wind

As the older brother Phillip felt responsible for the dreams of his younger sister Philipa. He actually wanted to become a navy captain but he sacrificied his own dreams for his sister. He met Old Nate and saw an opportunity to help him with his airships and made his sister really happy.
Colonel Joseph Potts, Expert of foundries

Smelting all types of ores was always a passion in the family. As a good family member Colonel Potts stepped into the family business. He modernized it and made a top priority of safety in the workplace.
Alessandro Volta, The flow of electricity
Alessandro was groundbraking when it comes to electricity and ways we can transfer electricity. He dedicated his life to share his knowledge to as much people as possible.
Thomas Alva Edison, Master of light

Thomas Alva Edison perfected and combined different technologies to create the working light bulb that could be mass produced. This opened a lot of possibilities and together with electricity brought safer light to the people.
Zaire Mto Wa Bluu, Makes the river flow

Water is what he loves. It is the source of all life and really precious in Enbesa. After years of research and new insights, Zaire figured out how to make water pumps more effective and irrigate more land. He is now honored for his contributions.
Wendy van der Mark, Breeder of animals

Together with her 2 brothers Mark and Rolf and sister Judy she started a business. Wendy always looked up to her brother Mark and would never leave his side. When Rolf decided to move to the Arctic and Judy also could no longer stand her brother, Wendy stayed with Mark to keep running the family business.
Judy van der Mark, Sheep and goat lover

Judy was always attracted by sheep and goats. Other animals did never really interest her. At some point there were troubles in the familybusiness she started with her 2 brothers and sister. Together with her brother Rolf she left the business. He went to the Arctic but she would not leave her sheep and goats who can not live in that cold climate. She sometimes goes to Enbesa to help the goat farms.
Zendaya Chedjou, Meat is meat

From the moment she saw a picture of the Old World, Zendaya had the dream to travel to this unknown country. When she became an adult and had enough money to travel she took the risk and left everything behind to find her happiness in the Old World. She took her expertise with her and now works in the slaughterhouses to process pigs and process the meat to new products unknown for the people of the Old World.
Veronica Castelli, Let it grow with less space

Veronica has the same love for crops like her brother Cosmo. They both specialise in the crops of the Old world. But Veronica has learned some tricks from the new world and found a solution to harvast corn together with other crops, and that with a smaller amount of fields. She does not like the monoculture and plants trees inside and next to the fields which results in extra fruits.
Alisha Al-Zahir, Less fields more profits

Alisha has her own opinions about the way we grow our crops. She actually thinks we should use less space to give nature something back. She is a big example for het brother Ali and took some research she learned in Enbesa back home to the New World.
Abebe Kanumba, Space optimization

The dry lands of Enbesa are really hard to grow crops. Abebe made it his goal in life to find better ways to grow crops with less space, which results in less water. He found a way to manipulate seeds to make it possible to grow other crops on the islands of Enbesa.
Trudy Garnier, Grain is gold

Trudy and her brother Marie-Antoine are the perfect baking duo. Trudy takes care of the best grain and her brother then uses that flour to bake some lovely bread. She also likes to make some biscuits in her spare time.
Dennis Black, Pump it up
Dennis could drink oil if it would be possible. He loves the black gold. He has set up some safety procedures to reduce the chance of explosions drasticly.
Lucy Roberts, Power to the people
Lucy is the expert if it comes to power plants. If it is an oil based or gas based power plant, she has it covered. Safety first is her motto.
Macy Parker, No rendering no glory
Macy specialises in processing pigs and tallow. Tallow has no secrets anymore for her. She researched other processes with pigs and tallow and found out she could extract other goods from them.
Maurice Dupont, Give the tractors some juice

As a kid Maurice saw the technological advancements go by and tractors fascinated him from the start. When he grew up his goal was to ride one of those fantastic machines. When he finaly was able to fulfil his dream he focused on maximising the output of oil needed by the tractors.
Polly Davies, Is it running
Polly loves machines. As one of the best engineers she knows almost every motor inside out. Almost ever machine that uses a motor has been dismantled and put back together by her.
Curtis Blink, Make it shiny
Curtis does not like to work with coal. He uses wood instead of coal to melt the gold ore. He experiments to get other types of materials.
Hendrick Harrison, Up and down

Elevators make the life of many people so much easier. Hendrick was one of the first people using an elevator and was really impressed. But from his perspective an elevator should be with a view to the outside. That is why he prefers to use glass and not wood veneers.
Jacques Brun, Baking chocolat biscuits

Jacques is the big rival of Marie-Antoine. They both love to bake and challenge eachother in baking contests. Last time they were at a contest they had a huge fight and almost destroyed eachothers creations. The jury had to come inbetween them. And they both were disqualified.
Henry Mill, Typing 24/7
Henry was one of the first persons who thought about putting letters in a sequence on paper that would result in a new machine, a typewriter.
Zola Kanumba, Mixing the forest seeds

Zola does not like the monoculture of the orchyards. She mixes things up to make sure all those beautiful, colorful blossoms are mixed together to create amazing views in the Old World and the New World.
Kofi Adomako, Cigars and Pipes
In Enbesa he was known for his quality clay pipes. He traveled to the New World to learn more about cigars. He was so inspired that he left his brother Adamo in Enbesa and stayed in the New World.
Mildred Mitchell, Tailormade

Mildred is one of the finest knitters of the Old World. At a certain point he was tired of those boring Old World clothing designs that he went to Enbesa to learn more about the colorful clothing from this fantastic world. He came back to the Old World with so many new ideas.
Alexander Graham Bell, Calling home
Alexander Graham Bell was one of the founders of the first telephone and made his mark in history.
Mariana Soto, Weaving till you drop
Mariana knows every textile and fibre inside out. Weaving has no secrets for her. She discovered ways to make paper from textiles.
Gertrude von Malching, Digging for gold

Mining is a family tradition. Like her brothers Jörg and Fritz, Gertrude is always looking for ways to improve the mining business. She decided to focus on the gold mining business in the New World because the time it takes to extract gold there is not good enough. She developed amazing new ways to boost the production to a amazing level. Number 6 is her lucky number.
Ana Paula Vargas, I like sugar and cannot lie
Sugar is the white gold for Ana Paula. She loves to make so many things with it. In the future she will make sure there will be more goods that use her sugar. She loves beer with a sweet touch.
Juliana Perez, Wool is the answer

Juliana has lost her heart in Enbesa. She traveled there from the New World and not only fell in love with the beautiful continent but also with a woman, Hibo Ameziane. Together they started a clothing business. Juliana takes care of the raw materials and her partner Hibo Ameziane processes those to beautiful clothing that keep the Enbesan people warm and stylish. She has some nice tricks on her sleeve to process the raw materials to new goods.
Hibo Ameziane, Stylish clothing

Hibo is one of the best clothing makers from Enbesa. Together with her partner Juliana Perez who fell in love with Enbesa and Hibo, she started a clothing business. Hibo makes the most amazing clothing to keep the people of Enbesa warm and stylish at the same time.
Ghudan Keita, The finest looms

The finest tapestries of Enbesa are made by Ghudan. Some people say she has golden fingers, but she actually uses the newest looms to be more precise and efficient. With the leftovers she weaves finery.
Rua Okoro, With the tides of the sea

Sister of Aissa and Jumoke who both went to the Arctic. She was left behind in Enbesa but did not want to go to the Arctic. She focuses on the Saltworks and optimizing the process and extracting more goods from the sea with the tides.
Danen Bamidele, These boots are made for walking

Danen was always intriged by what he could do with animal materials. When he was working in the Dry-houses he saw a lot of the materials go to waste. He encourages to use everything and makes leather boots on the side.
Frank Keinehen, He loves beer
Frank is known for his unusual use of ingredients for beer. He has made a wide variety of sorts of beer. His latest creation is beer from Hibiscus petals.
Fritz von Malching, Mining on the surface

As the youngest of the von Malching mining family, Fritz is a bit claustrofobic and does not like to go in small tunnels inside the mountains to mine the precious ores. When he heard that in Enbesa they mine on the surface in rivers he decided to go to Enbesa and see how he could improve this type of mining with his family expertise.
Margaret Lee, Clay and sand

Margaret was always playing in the clay pits when she was a child. Her parents were really poor and working hard to make a living and giving Margaret a better future. When Margaret grew older she could not get the best work experience even though she has so many good skills with clay. The only job she could find was in the Brick Dry-House. She makes the best out of it and sometimes creates ceramics in her spare time to show her love for clay.
Mariette Brun, No pain no grain

Mariette is the sister of Jacques who is also in the baking business. Mariette left the Old World for the exotic Enbesa to explore new lands. There she realised grain was something she could actually also use as a replacement for teff.
Ayaan Chedjou, Canned meat is better meat

When she visited her sister Zendaya in the Old World she discovered the beauty of canned food. When she came back to Enbesa she decided to use this technique to conserve food longer and make sure no food was spilled when making stew.
Adamo Adomako, Pipes and Cigars

Together with his brother Kofi, Adamo was always to be found on the tabaco fields to find the best quality for their clay pipes. On their travels to the New World they learned about the cigars they make in the New World. When his brother decided to stay in the New World Adamo still wanted to go back home to Enbesa, but he took the knowledge of the cigars with him.
Elgizouli Nnamani, The keeper of the golden bees
People are not the best friends of Elgizouli, he prefers his bees. He is also a big lover of flowers which is the perfect combination together with his bees.
Kwame Aku, The perfect candles

Kwame has golden hands which he uses to make the perfect candles. He changed some basic principles in the process which results in extracting ethanol even he uses the same base products. The perfect candles he makes are then processed by his sister Makena to beautiful lanterns.
Makena Aku, Bringer of light

Makena always loved to carve objects out of the strong wanza timber. She perfected to art of carving lanterns out of wanza wood. This wood is so strong it can stand the heat of the candles inside. The perfect candles she gets from her brother Kwame.
Catherina Hendrika, The first journalist

When typewriters became a thing Catherina saw the opportunity to start writing for the University newspaper faster than before. She provides the Scholars with the perfect news to make them happy. On her free time she likes to cuddle her cat and work in the garden to see her flowers bloom.
Maya The Cat, Purring to happiness
Nobody has ever seen a more joyful and lovely cat than Maya. She provides the hotel guests with her warm presence and welcomes every new and returning guest with a nice purr.
Yared Aguta, Shiny no color

Yared wanted ceramics to have more value. With adding pearls instead of coloring them he created a new type of ceramics that were popular with a wide variety of people. He also makes ceramics jewellery the same time.
Rupert Flanders, Homeschooling
Rupert is a believer of homeschooling. We do not have to go to public schools or universities to learn new things. We can do this at home with the right guidance.
Jacky Daniels, Drinks for the rich

Jacky was drinking whiskey from a very young age. But once she tasted Cognac she would not drink anything else anymore. Her family was not amused with this but she did not care. Apart from Cognac she also discovered Rum and Champagne.
Brian Branch, Basic wooden tables

Brian and his family work in the wood business and perfect a lot of different wooden products for the Old World. His focus is simplifying the tables for the Billiard Tables. Now they are made with normal timber and not fancy Cherry Wood.
Brook Branch, Pure wood no shiny lacquer

Brook and her family work in the wood business and perfect a lot of different wooden products for the Old World. Her focus is making violins without the toxic Lacquer and with beautifull wood as a finish. For this finish she uses Wood Veneers and not Lacquer. She plays the violin herself and is a well known musician in the Old World. She also creates Gramophones to spread her music to the people.
Brandon Branch, Wooden toys

Brian and his family work in the wood business and perfect a lot of different wooden products for the Old World. His focus is wooden toys for kids. He never liked the fact that toys nowdays are made from celluloid and finished with a toxic lacquer. He replaces those with pure wood alternatives for beautiful wooden toys kids can play with. Apart from that some of the toys can also being used as Souvenirs for tourists.
Irene Braunkopf, Curly fresh hair

Irene was working as a hairdresser when she discovered shampoo had so much more potential. She started testing new formulas in her home and discovered some new fresh fragrances. With those new formulas she simplified a lot of the processes.
John Lemon, Sugarfree lemonade
John does not like sugar, it is an evil for our health. He bottles lemonade without any additive sugar and replaces it with hibiscus petals as an extra taste.
Britt Branch, Wooden souvenirs

Britt and her family work in the wood business and perfect a lot of different wooden products for the Old World. Her focus is making souvenirs out of wood. This results in beatiful new types of souvenirs that are made from the finest types of wood. Some of those souvenirs can also be used as toys.
Denise Blink, Lacquer efficiency
Like her brother Curtis Denise loves shiny things. The way lacquer makes surfaces more shiny gives her chills. She perfected the process of lacquer to use less materials.
Ernesto Vargas, No sugar, pure banana

Ernesto is the complete opposite of his sister Ana Paula. He dislikes sugar and wants to use it as less as possible. He focuses on chewing gum and decided to remove the additive sugars and replace it with plantains.
Francesco Plastmasa, Celluloid efficiency

Together with his sister Francesca, Francesco was always looking for new materials and ways to improve products. When they discovered what they could do with Camphor Wax and Ethanol he researched more efficient ways to use those materials in the process of making Celluloid.
Francesca Plastmasa, Ethanol overdrive

Together with her brother Francesco, Francesca was always looking for new materials and ways to improve products. She saw new opportunities in the process of making Ethanol and improved this process even further.
Marco Paulo, Spicing things up
Marco likes the taste of spicy food. He always makes food with that extra spicy taste. A good meal need to have a good spicy sauce to be perfect.
Sister Moppertus, Drinks from the hacienda

Sister Moppertus first devoted her life to god, but saw Brother Hilarius doing amazing work with making interesting drinks. She decided to devote her life more to the hacienda optimazation and the different drinks that are made there. She did not carer if this is with gods consent or not. She loves alcohol.
Lena Brown, Fertiliser from the woods

Lena is the sister of Gretl Brown and the daughter of Lukas Brown. Like her father she was interested in how we can improve our farmlands with fertiliser. But in contrast with her father she wanted more existing natural resources to be used for fertiliser and focuses on the wonders of the woods to produce fertiliser.
Lukas Brown, Collector of dung

Lukas is the father of Gretl and Lena Brown. Lukas can always be found near animal farms. He discovered the potential of dung from visiting the New World. With some brown magic he processes the dung immediatly to fertiliser, ready to use on the farmlands.
Valentina de Faro, Chocolate, Coffee and biscuits

Valentina is the bigger sister of Fernando de Faro. Fernando learned to make the best coffee from Valentina who learned from their father who passed away many years ago. They both now pass through the way of coffee making, Valentina knows more then just coffee, she likes the sweet taste of chocolate and biscuits.
Mrs Garrick, Money and Shiny things are not the answer
Mrs Garrick is the sister of Mr Garrick. She actually does not like the expensive goods and the bank.
Georgina Ravenscroft, Inventor of modern sand collecting
The Glassmaking business was always part of the Ravenscroft empire, but it was Georgina who significantly automized and shorthened the process of sand collection and extraction.
Lola Mazigh, Persuader of the sea

Lola is the sister of Lalla Mazigh and so, also a relative of Mme. Kahina. If Lola is part of the ships crew, no ship dares to attack. She has the sweetest voice that can make the biggest enemy your friend.
Lou Mazigh, Perfect trading routes

Lou is the father of Lola and Lalla. Like his daughter Lola, he likes to sail to sea and feel the wind. He focused on the optimization of ships to achieve a higher grade of efficiency for his trade business.
Flappy, The best Arctic friend

Flappy is the best friend of Carsten Green who domesticated Flappy from when he was a pup. Flappy was left alone by his parents in the woods where Carsten found him. Flappy is now always at the side of Carsten when they wander in the woods. Flappy lightens the spirit of the Arctic people.
Flippy, Flippin awesome

We all know dogs that are just flippin awesome. Flippy is one of those dogs. He likes to play with toys that squeak, but awsome that he is, always he hears a squeak he is so shocked he jumps a meter in to the air.
Floppy, Herder of animals

Floppy is a 4th generation herding dog. The family of Floppy was always within the Van der Mark family and helped the van der Mark family grow their animal farm empire. Without Floppy and her family the business would not be that succesful.
Kulwa Mto Wa Bluu, Less damage more speed and cargo

Kulwa is the twinsister of Zaire. Both loving the water, Kulwa decided to leave land and her brother to go on the sea and explore new lands. She devoted her service on military ships to make sure the cargo they hold do not hold the ships back.
Torpedo Of Doom
The ultimate torpedo, no ship will survive this impact.
Ultra Rapid Canister shot
The ultimate granular warfare. Bombs flying faster then ever.
Sea Mine Of Death
Put those legendary mines underneath the surface and no one will pass.
Auto-Controllable-Pitch Propeller
The ultimate legendary propeller for every steamship.
Doctor Edward Davy, A Healthy Lifestyle

Doctor Edward Davy is a big believer of a healthy lifestyle. He convinces his patients to keep riding a bike instead of using those dirty unhealthy steam carriages. He leads by example and everywhere he goes he takes his bicycle. He is also aginst smoking cigars and will give you a lecture on how unhealthy smoking is.
Helga Hogarth, Airship Platform Master Of Arms

Sister of the famous Hogarth The Harbourmaster, Veteran Of Trelawney. Like her brother she takes interest in loading and unloading of ships. She perfects the efficienty how ships can be loaded and unloaded more rapidly.
Captain Pirtylo, Scouting From The Sky

Captain Pirtylo reaches for the sky in massive airships. When he was a child he lost one of his best friends who was kidnapped by pirates. He swore he would find his friend when he grew up. Until this day he flies around the world searching for his lost friend, hoping one day he will find him.
Joseph Christians, Talking Sense Into People

Joseph is the husband of Mad Mary. He sees his wife doing crazy things in mines without thinking what could happen. He balances out those crazy ideas and makes sure everything goes according to (his) plan.
Pirate Captain's Black Sail
With this legendary black sail every ship can outrun a sailing opponent.
Oliver Thorlof, The Happiest Cool Postman

Communication flows through Olivers blood. He follows this passion by being a happy postman for everybody in the Arctic. He delivers every letter to everybody personaly through the cold of the Arctic making all the recipients happy people.
Cecce Celeste, Postman Manager
Celeste is not a normal postwoman. She manages all the Old World and New World Post Offices. She expects the best of all postman, to deliver every letter with a big smile to the recipients.
All Old World and New World post offices and post boxes
Birdy Bird, Fastest Air Messages

Pigeon of postman Oliver. Delivering every letter from window to window without hesitating. It was postman Oliver that trained this pigeon to be the perfect post pigeon. When people see Birdy flying by they wave and throw grain on the ground for Birdy to eat.
Raveena Bhargava, The Airship Architect

Raveena is the sister of Rohit. Like her brother she devoted her life to the construction of ships. She always wanted to be an inventor and is still pursuing this dream in a search to new technologies.
Ron Rogers, Forger Of Fake Mail
Ron was already multiple times in prison for forging false documents. Every time he gets out he starts again. This time he found a business in forging fake mail and sells fake stories.
Brenda Ironbright, The War Must Go On

Brenda is the younger sister of Bruno Ironbright. They both found without shame their way to producing weapons on a large scale. Weopons are not always the answer, but that is not how Brenda sees things. Shoot first ask questions later is het motto.
All Old World and New World Bomb Factories and Sea Mine Factories
Edsan Orantes, Play With The Ball

Edsan was always fan of soccer/football whatever you want to call it. As a child he always played with his friends and later made a career out if it. Now that he is retired he devoted his life to produce balls and make kids happy with kid friendly versions.
Jacobus Fussall, Ice Cream For Everyone

Jacobus found perfect ways of mass manufacturing ice cream and perfected the process by choosing the right ingredients. He favours the flavour of coconut ice cream and tries to balance the amount of sugar. He combines the ice cream with a cookie.
Koko Flanel, Healthy Perfumes

Koko hated the current state of the beauty industry and the use of chemicals and alcohol in so many products. She decided to create her own formula without all those additives and uses more skin friendly products. Her perfume is not to spray but to smear on your skin.
Alfred Lowman, Natural Herbs Cure Everything

Alfred believes we can cure everything with the right herbs and plants we find in nature. By looking around is we can create the best medicines and cure all diseases. When in doubt take some herbal tea!
Holario Javino, Dance Dance Baby

Holario devoted his life to Samba music and making people happy. For him this is a way of life and he is always dancing in public places and encourages people to do the same. Making people happy when dancing. We should dance and sing and be happy! Not go to war, church or a boxing arena.
General Agnes Mercier, Anarchist Propaganda

General Agnes is the sister of Hugo Mercier. Like her brother she was raised the Anarchist way. The cinema and film is the perfect way to show the people how they should live their life and stay on the "right" path. It is not propaganda if it is true, right?
Josephine Grey, Fertiliser Everywhere

Josephine is the wife of Lucas Brown. Like her husband she has a strange relationsship with dung and the use for fertiliser. By using some speciallised processes she extracts extra Ethanol during the fertiliser process.
Bio Dung Fertiliser
A fertiliser based on dung with some extra bio additives for extra optimization. It smells a bit, but who cares?
Henrich Morris, Space Efficient Storage

Henrich started a storage business together with his wife Roberta. They were a fantastic duo and it was not long before they found beter ways to store goods in the same space. Better inventarisation, better arrangement, when they put something in storage it would never get lost. But offcourse, this has a price.
Roberta Dompson, Layered Storage Solutions

Roberta started a storage business together with her husband Henrich. When they went on their honeymoon to the Arctic, Roberta also fell in love with the beauty of the snow and the landscapes of the Arctic. From a professional point of view she saw a lot of opportunities to improve the storage possibilities in the Arctic conditions. But not without the needed investiments.
Ferdinand Da Edificio, Monuments Will Rise Everywhere

Ferdinand is a building engineer who specialises in the bigger buildings, the monuments. Compared to his construction collegues he knows tricks to make building monuments more efficient and more safe. The sky. is the limit, the bigger the building, the more he likes it.
All Monument Building Phases
Frotz Wogmann, Inventor Of Synthetic Rubber
Frotz wanted to get rid of the complex harvesting of rubbers like caoutchouc. He discovered a new way of making rubbers based on other basic materials when working in the chemical plants.
All Glassmakers
Other Kitchens
All Steel Industry
All Filament And Cable Factories
All Arctic Depots
All Fertiliser Works And Dung Plants
All Tea Production
All Chemical Plants: Lacquer
All Violin Production
All Sailmakers
All Flour Mills
All Tallow Processing
All Slaughterhouses
Julie Black, Gas and oil can work together

Julie is the sister of Dennis. They both grew up with the black gold, oil. But Julie was more interested what she could find in the ground apart from oil and discovered oil was not the only resource that was hiding underground. Apart from the oil as a byproduct there were natural gasses that could also be pumped up.
Olivier Levassier, You shall not pass without paying
Olivier is a former pirate that now uses his skills in managing the harbour. But not without actually making sure he takes something for himself.
Expensive things
Rudy Scholz, Scraps from the sea

Rudy moved to the colder Arctic with one of the expeditions to the North. He lost of one his best friends to the harsh environment of the Arctic. He got separated from his friend during a big storm. By searching for lost expeditions scraps he hopes to find a sign of his lost friend.
Herbert Scholz, Scraps from steel
Herbert sees scrap everywhere in the production of steel. During the production he is able to create scraps with the leftover materials. Like his brother and sisters he is in the scrap business.
Heidi Scholz, Scraps from weapons
Like her brothers and sister Heidi is in the scrap business. Unlike her brother she can make scraps with better quality.
Regina Scholz, Scraps from advanced weapons
As the oldest of the 4 children of the Scholz family, Regina is the most advanced in scrapmaking. The scrap she produces from the advanced weapons production is the best you can find.
Marie-Antoinette Montagne, Rich gases

Marie-Antoinette is the sister of the father of the Montagne mining brothers. She followed the sons of her brother to the Arctic as a promise to her brother to take care of them. Apart from the arctic gas she found other rich gases in the ground.
